text: The only failure right now is pylint failing #475
title: nan

text: Can we have this a static, with the exception of the `if` statement? e.g no method for it.
title: (None, '', u'astroid/scoped_nodes.py')

text:
I'm aware of this. I just didn't have time to tackle it. The problem is of a cyclic dependency:
- pylint 2.0 depends on an un-released 2.0 version. In the past, we solved this by adding a `dependency_links` with the link to an astroid 2.0 archive in pylint's `__pkginfo__`
- astroid depends on latest pylint for linting. We could try to limit this one to a released version, since it is fine like that. 
If you have some spare cycles, the second approach should be a simple PR.
title: nan

text: Alright, did that. Thanks for pointing me in the right direction
title: nan
